00013 AbstractComediView::AbstractComediView(const QString & devfile,
00014                                        int sdtype,
00015                                        QWidget *p, Qt::WindowFlags f)
00016     : QWidget(p, f), c(0), sdtype(sdtype), subdev(-1)
00017 {
00018     c = ComediEmul::getInstance(devfile.toUtf8().data());
00019     if (c) subdev = c->findByType(sdtype);
00020 }

00022 AbstractComediView::~AbstractComediView()
00023 {
00024     if (c) c->putInstance();
00025     c = 0;

00028 ComediAIView::ComediAIView(const QString & devfile, 
00029                            double ailow, double aihigh,
00030                            QWidget *p, Qt::WindowFlags f)
00031     : AbstractComediView(devfile, COMEDI_SUBD_AI, p, f), ailow(ailow), aihigh(aihigh), didpalinit(false)
00032 {
00033     if (subdev < 0) return;
00034     QGridLayout *lo = new QGridLayout(this);
00035     QDoubleValidator *dv = new QDoubleValidator(0.0, 5.0, 2, this);
00036     QLabel *l = new QLabel("AI Low: ", this);
00037     lo->addWidget(l, 0, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00038     l->setToolTip("The 'low' voltage to use when pushbutton is not depressed");
00039     QLineEdit *e = new QLineEdit(this);
00040     lo->addWidget(e, 0, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00041     e->setValidator(dv);
00042     e->setText(QString::number(ailow));
00043     connect(e, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString &)), this, SLOT(aiLowChanged(const QString &)));
00044     l = new QLabel("AI High: ", this);
00045     lo->addWidget(l, 0, 2, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00046     l->setToolTip("The 'high' voltage to use when pushbutton is depressed");
00047     e = new QLineEdit(this);
00048     lo->addWidget(e, 0, 3, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00049     e->setValidator(dv);
00050     e->setText(QString::number(aihigh));
00051     lo->setColumnStretch(4, 1);
00052     connect(e, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString &)), this, SLOT(aiHighChanged(const QString &)));
00053     int nchans = c->getNChans(subdev);
00054     QGroupBox *gb = new QGroupBox(QString("AI Channels (0 - %1)").arg(nchans-1), this);
00055     gb->setToolTip("Click channel buttons to toggle AI state high/low");
00056     lo->addWidget(gb, 1, 0, 1, 5);
00057     QGridLayout *lo2 = new QGridLayout(gb);
00058     QScrollArea *qsa = new QScrollArea(gb);
00059     QWidget *w = new QWidget(0);
00060     qsa->setWidgetResizable(true);
00061     lo2->addWidget(qsa, 0, 0);
00062     lo2 = new QGridLayout(w);
00063     
00064     for (int i = 0; i < nchans; ++i) {
00065         QToolButton *b = new QToolButton(w);
00066         if (!didpalinit) {
00067             QPalette p = b->palette();            
00068             p.setColor(QPalette::ButtonText, QColor(0, 0, 0));
00069             p.setColor(QPalette::Button, QColor(0, 255, 0));
00070             normalpal = p;            
00071             p.setColor(QPalette::ButtonText, QColor(255, 0, 0));
00072             p.setColor(QPalette::Button, QColor(0, 0, 0));
00073             hipal = p;
00074             didpalinit = true;
00075         }
00076         lo2->addWidget(b, 0, i);
00077         b->setCheckable(true);
00078         connect(b, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(buttonToggle(bool)));
00079         aibuttons.push_back(b);
00080     }
00081     qsa->setWidget(w);
00082     refreshView();
00083 }
00084 
00085 void ComediAIView::aiLowChanged(const QString &t)
00086 {
00087     bool ok;    
00088     double tmp = t.toDouble(&ok);
00089     if (ok) ailow = tmp;
00090     refreshView();
00091 }
00092 
00093 void ComediAIView::aiHighChanged(const QString &t)
00094 {
00095     bool ok;    
00096     double tmp = t.toDouble(&ok);
00097     if (ok) aihigh = tmp;
00098     refreshView();
00099 }
00100 
00101 void ComediAIView::buttonToggle(bool state)
00102 {
00103     QList<QToolButton *>::iterator it;
00104     int ch;
00105     for (it = aibuttons.begin(), ch = 0; it != aibuttons.end(); ++it, ++ch)
00106         if (*it == sender()) {
00107             if (state)
00108                 c->write(subdev, ch, aihigh);
00109             else
00110                 c->write(subdev, ch, ailow);
00111             break;
00112         }
00113     refreshView();
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 void ComediAIView::refreshView()
00118 {
00119     QList<QToolButton *>::iterator it;
00120     int ch;
00121     for (it = aibuttons.begin(), ch = 0; it != aibuttons.end(); ++it, ++ch) {
00122         QToolButton *b = *it;
00123         b->blockSignals(true);
00124         double v = c->read(subdev, ch);
00125         bool isdown = false;
00126         if (v >= aihigh-0.001) isdown = true;
00127         b->setChecked(isdown);
00128         if (isdown) {            
00129             b->setPalette(hipal);
00130             b->setText(QString("Ch. %1 %2V (hi)").arg(ch,2,10,QLatin1Char('0')).arg(v));
00131         } else {
00132             b->setPalette(normalpal);
00133             b->setText(QString("Ch. %1 %2V (lo)").arg(ch,2,10,QLatin1Char('0')).arg(v));
00134             b->setForegroundRole(QPalette::NoRole);
00135         }
00136         b->blockSignals(false);
00137     }
00138 }

00141 DIOLed::DIOLed(int sd, int ch, QWidget *p, Qt::WindowFlags f)
00142   : QWidget(p, f), ch(ch), sd(sd), ishigh(true), high("#ff0000"), low("#661111")
00143 {
00144   setMaximumWidth(10);
00145   setMaximumHeight(10);
00146   setMinimumWidth(10);
00147   setMinimumHeight(10);
00148 }

00150 DIOLed::~DIOLed() {}

00152 void DIOLed::setState(bool h)
00153 {
00154   ishigh = h;
00155   repaint();
00156 }
00157 
00158 void DIOLed::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *e)
00159 {
00160   (void)e;
00161   QPainter p(this);
00162   QColor color = ishigh ? high : low;
00163 
00164   // gray it out if it is disabled..
00165   if (!isEnabled()) color = QColor((QColor(Qt::gray).red()+color.red())/2,
00166                                    (QColor(Qt::gray).green()+color.green())/2,
00167                                    (QColor(Qt::gray).blue()+color.blue())/2);
00168   p.setBrush( Qt::SolidPattern );
00169   p.setBrush( color );
00170   p.setPen( color );
00171   p.drawRect(0, 0, width(), height());
00172   e->accept();
00173 }
00174 
00175 void DIOLed::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e)
00176 {
00177   e->accept();
00178   emit clicked();
00179 }

00182 ComediDIOView::ComediDIOView(const QString & devfile, QWidget *p, Qt::WindowFlags f)
00183     : AbstractComediView(devfile, COMEDI_SUBD_DIO, p, f)
00184 {
00185     if (subdev < 0) return;
00186     //QGridLayout *l1 = new QGridLayout(this);
00187     //QScrollArea *qsa = new QScrollArea(this);
00188     //QWidget *w = new QWidget(qsa);
00189     QWidget *w = this;
00190     //qsa->setWidget(w);
00191     //qsa->setWidgetResizable(true);
00192     //l1->addWidget(qsa, 0, 0);
00193     setToolTip("Click the LEDs toggle DIO channels high/low");
00194     QGridLayout *l = new QGridLayout(w);
00195     int row = 0, nchans, chan, sd = subdev;
00196     do {
00197         nchans = c->getNChans(sd);
00198         l->addWidget(new QLabel(QString("DIO Subdev %1:").arg(sd)), row, 0, Qt::AlignRight);
00199         for (chan = 0; chan < nchans; ++chan) {
00200             DIOLed *but = new DIOLed(sd, chan, w);
00201             but->setToolTip(QString("DIO Chan %1 on subdev %2").arg(chan).arg(sd));
00202             l->addWidget(but, row, chan+1);
00203             leds.push_back(but);
00204             connect(but, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(ledClicked()));
00205         }
00206         l->addWidget(new QWidget, row, chan+1);
00207         l->setColumnStretch(chan+1, 1);
00208         ++row;
00209     } while ( (sd = c->findByType(COMEDI_SUBD_DIO, sd+1)) > -1);
00210 }
00211 
00212 
00213 void ComediDIOView::ledClicked()
00214 {
00215     DIOLed *d;
00216     if ((d = dynamic_cast<DIOLed *>(sender()))) {
00217         double v = !d->state() ? 1.0 : 0.0;
00218         c->write(d->subDev(), d->chan(), v);
00219         refreshView();
00220     }
00221 }
00222 
00223 void ComediDIOView::refreshView()
00224 {
00225     QList<DIOLed *>::iterator it;
00226     for (it = leds.begin(); it != leds.end(); ++it) {
00227         DIOLed *d = *it;
00228         bool ishigh = c->read(d->subDev(), d->chan()) > 0.0;
00229         d->blockSignals(true);
00230         d->setState(ishigh);
00231         d->blockSignals(false);
00232     }
00233 }

00235 
00236 ComediAOView::ComediAOView(const QString &d, QWidget *p, Qt::WindowFlags f)
00237     : AbstractComediView(d, COMEDI_SUBD_AO, p, f)
00238 {
00239     if (subdev < 0) return;
00240     QGridLayout *lo = new QGridLayout(this);
00241     int ch, nchans = c->getNChans(subdev), col;
00242     
00243     for (ch = 0, col = 0; ch < nchans; ++ch) {
00244         QLabel *lbl = new QLabel(QString("Ch. %1:").arg(ch, 2, 10, QLatin1Char('0')), this);
00245         QLCDNumber *lcd = new QLCDNumber(this);
00246         lcd->setSmallDecimalPoint(true);
00247         lcd->setNumDigits(4);
00248         lcds.push_back(lcd);
00249         lo->addWidget(lbl, 0, col++, Qt::AlignRight);
00250         lo->addWidget(lcd, 0, col++, Qt::AlignLeft);
00251     }
00252 }
00253 
00254 void ComediAOView::refreshView()
00255 {
00256     QList<QLCDNumber *>::iterator it;
00257     int ch;
00258     for (ch = 0, it = lcds.begin(); it != lcds.end(); ++ch, ++it) {
00259         double v = c->read(subdev, ch);
00260         (*it)->display(v);
00261     }
00262 }
